alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 12:48PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Lake and southern Flathead Counties through 115 PM MDT... At 1247 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Woods Bay, or 15 miles north of Polson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woods Bay, Rollins, and Lakeside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near Flathead Lake, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
